channel.title: CVE Feed for Dolibarr -- Dolibarr ERP CRM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dolibarr -- Dolibarr ERP CRM

item.title: CVE-2023-4197|2024-08-02T07:17:12.146Z -- dolibarr -- dolibarr%20erp%20crm
item.description: Improper input validation in Dolibarr ERP CRM <= v18.0.1 fails to strip certain PHP code from user-supplied input when creating a Website, allowing an attacker to inject and evaluate arbitrary PHP code.

item.title: CVE-2023-4198|2024-08-02T07:17:12.191Z -- dolibarr -- dolibarr%20erp%20crm
item.description: Improper Access Control in Dolibarr ERP CRM <= v17.0.3 allows an unauthorized authenticated user to read a database table containing customer data
